description.en:
Contains 6 stories besides the main one:

[*] Bara no Oujisama (Prince of Rose)

[*] Himitsu no Kobeya

[*] Ai ga Nai!!

[*] Oatsui no ka Osuki? (Do You Like Hot Springs?) -
Having been dumped by his boyfriend, Tomohisa goes to take a shower only to find that the hot water heater is broken. With a broken heart and his feelings at an all time low, he heads off to the public bath. Will his luck turn for the worse or will it finally turn for the better?

[*] HAPPY BIRTHDAY

[*] Kaihou (Release)

[*] Himitsu no Hanazono (Secret Garden)
